1.title: Choose your character

choices: Tails continues trying to make Sonic come out
1111.content:
Tails had slowly grown tired of being the little brother. He decided to build a machine to make Sonic a little smaller than himself so he could find out what it was like to be the big brother."Hey, Sonic, do you mind testing something out for me?" he asked as Sonic dashed into the house.

"Sure, lil' bro." Sonic replied.

Tails picked his device up. "After this, we'll see who's little." he said to himself quietly.

"Huh?" Sonic asked.

"Nothing.On the count of 3. 1...2...3!!" Tails announced, then fired the machine. Sonic shrank to about 3 to 4 inches tall. "Hee Hee Hee. Not so little now, am I, Sonic?" Tails asked darkly.

Sonic took frightened steps back as Tails walked towards him. "T-Tails, wh-what's g-g-goin on?!" he asked.

"Heh heh heh. I just shrank you." Tails said, then grabbed at the blue hedgehog. Sonic fled to the couch. "Hey, get back here!!!" Tails demanded.

"Why? Why's he doing this? Did I do something wrong? Is he mad at me for something?" Sonic thought. "Tails, what's happened to you? I thought we were friends." Sonic whimpered.

"I'm sick of being the little one. So, I thought maybe I should change that up." Tails replied in a dark, wicked tone. "Now get out here!"

"What did I do that was so bad?" Sonic thought as he curled up.
1111.title: Tails's Twisted Mind

11111.content:
Tails noticed that Sonic wasn't going to come out any time soon, so he walked up to the couch and reached a hand under it. He felt and grabbed Sonic, then pulled him out. "You should have listened to me when I told you to come out." Tails growled, then squeezed Sonic tightly.

"AAAAHHHH!!!!!!!!" Sonic screeched in pain. Tails then threw Sonic across the room. Sonic weakly forced himself onto his feet, then fled and found somewhere to hide. He crawled under the door and hid under the bed in the room. He could hear Tails's footsteps in the hallway. "He's coming!! He's going to kill me!!" Sonic thought in panic. The footsteps stopped outside the door. "I'm going to die!!!!!!!" Sonic's thoughts screamed in his ears. The footsteps continued down the hall, but Sonic was in such a panic he didn't notice. "He's gonna come in any second!!!!!!!!" And with that, he began screaming and rocking back and forth, hugging his knees tightly.

"Heh heh. Found you." Tails thought, then opened the door to the room Sonic was in. Sonic managed to hear the door open. His heart beat accelerated to the point that, if he wasn't able to move as fast, he would have died right then. But his heart could beat a lot faster before it would stop.Tails lunged and grabbed Sonic. At this point, Sonic was crying and was unable to breathe. The fear was overwhelming. Tails noticed that Sonic was crying and unable to breathe.
11111.title: Violence and Fear

choices: Sonic is too scared to move, thinking it's a trap
111111.content: Tails grinned and squeezed Sonic a little tighter. Sonic went limp. Tails froze, staring at Sonic. Then he realized what he was doing. "S-Sonic, w-wake up!! Please!!!" Tails yelped. Sonic was unresponsive. Tails's ears drooped. "Sonic..." he whimpered, gently placing Sonic on the ground. A few minutes passed before Sonic came to. He looked up in fear, seeing who or what was in front of him. "Sonic, I-" Tails began, but the very second he moved his hand, Sonic shrieked and ran back to his hiding place, his hands gripping the sides of his head and tears streaming down his cheeks as he rocked back and forth, traumatized. Tails hung his head, feeling awful. "Sonic, please, I-I'm sorry. I didn't mean any of it. Please, forgive me." Tails pleaded urgently. Sonic wouldn't answer, as he fainted again. Tails's eyes widened. "Oh no. What have I done to him?!" he thought as he pulled Sonic out from under the bed with shaking hands. He checked Sonic's heartbeat. It was fast. Even faster then Sonic could run. "No. No, this can't be happening. I-I didn't mean to. I-I almost killed him." Tails thought in horror. He gently put Sonic back under the bed, then curled up in a fetal position, hands covering his face as he began to cry. About 15 minutes later, Sonic woke up to find Tails sobbing.
111111.title: A Horror Beyond Compare

1111111.content:
Sonic couldn't stand seeing Tails cry, no matter what the circumstances might be. He ran up to Tails. "Tails, you okay?" Sonic asked quietly.

"I'm so sorry, Sonic!!" Tails sobbed, now crying harder.

"Tails, please, don't cry. I can't stand seeing you cry. Come on. Calm down." Sonic pleaded, trying to help his 'big' brother. Tails just continued crying. "Tails, if you kep crying, I'm gonna wind up crying too. And that wouldn't be good, would it?"

"N-no." Tails whimpered.

"Then stop. Please. I can't stand seeing you cry much longer. Please." Sonic pleaded, his spirits weakening.
1111111.title: A Brother's Love

11111111.content:
Tails sniffled and rubbed his eyes, trying to calm down. Sonic gripped one of Tails's hands, trying to provide some extra comfort. Tails sniffled harder, then completely broke down. He began crying even harder. "Tails…" Sonic whimpered, now feeling even worse. Tails pulled away from his older brother, trying not to show how upset he was. Sonic began crying softly. He ran up to Tails and hugged his ‘big’ brother as best he could. He had practically buried himself in Tails's fur by the time Tails had calmed down.

Tails looked down at Sonic, gently picked the blue hedgehog up, and hugged him. "I'm sorry, Sonic. I was just really upset. Don't worry. I feel better now. A lot better. Don't cry."

Sonic looked up at Tails, then rubbed his face against Tails's chest, effectively wiping his tears away. "Um…Tails…you know that being the big brother means that you have to be the older one and look after your little brother, right?"

"Really? So, I'd have to make you younger so I could be the big brother."

"Yeah."

"Cool! I have something for that!" Tails said excitedly, then practically abandoned Sonic in the room.

"But I won't make it easy for you, Tails. Not after how you acted earlier. I gotta make sure you can handle it right. And I'm gonna make sure you get how hard it is." Sonic thought, then leaned up against the wall. Tails returned after a few minutes with two machines. The first one made Sonic grow to about 5 feet tall. The second, on the other hand, made Sonic become 4 years old and 1 foot tall. Tails then used the second machine to become 16 years old. He was now about 4 feet tall. "This is so cool!" Sonic said, then ran around in circles, causing a tornado to form. "Oopsies." Sonic giggled.

Tails quickly reversed the tornado, thus getting rid of it. "Be careful, Sonic." Tails sighed, patting his now little brother's head.

"Okay!" Sonic replied. He hugged Tails's leg. Tails laughed slightly at this.
11111111.title: Bad Mistake

111111111.content:
Sonic was nuzzled against Tails as they both watched TV. Tails stroked the little boy's quills as Sonic sucked his thumb. Just then a thought occurred to him.

"Sonic, you were potty trained at age four, right?" Tails inquired.

As if answering his question, Sonic began peeing on the couch.

"Sowwy bwo bwo," Sonic replied, still peeing.

Tails sighed.

"Guess I'm going to have to diaper you."

As soon as Sonic was finished, Tails picked him up and looked for either training pants. After what seemed like hours of searching, he found....
111111111.title: An hour later

1111111111.content:
Tails was hoping that he would find something more suited for Slnic's current age, but he cod only find baby diapers that were in Sonic's size.

"Sorry, little buddy. Guess it's baby diapers for you," Tails told Sonic.

Sonic looked up at Tails and sucked his thumb.

"It okay," He replied.

Tails smiled down at Sonic and took one of the diapers from the package. He then carried him to the changing table and laid him down on it. He then wiped Sonic's crotch and rubbed baby oil on that same area. Finally, he powdered and diapered Sonic. Tails picked Sonic up and held him close.

'Thankies bwo bwo," Sonic replied.

Tails smiled.

"You're welcome," Tails replied.

The blue boy then yawned and fell asleep sucking his thumb. Tails smiled and carried him to his room. He then laid him in the bed, tucked him in, and kissed him on the head.

"Sleep tight, little bro."

Tails yawned and walked to his own room. Finally, he laid down upon his bed and drifted off to sleep.
1111111111.title: baby diapers

choices: After the trip to the hospital
111111112.content:
The next morning, Sonic's stomach gave a growl. "TAAAIIILLS!!!!!!" Sonic cried. "I HUNGRY!!!!!!!!"

Tails yawned and got up. Sonic looked over at Tails, his eyes full of urgency. "Okay. I'm on it. You didn't have to scream." Tails huffed, giving Sonic a frustrated look. He had been having troubles with Sonic for a while now. After making a bowl of cereal for Sonic, he noticed something brown in the corner. "Sonic…what did you do?" Tails asked in an irritated growl. Sonic just blushed slightly, looking a bit embarrassed, which he definitely should have been. "Great! Thanks a lot!" Tails snapped, then stormed back to his room and slammed the door shut.

Sonic grinned. "I made a uh-oh." Sonic giggled. His mentality was slipping into a toddler's state, but he also knew what he was doing. He ate his cereal, then jumped down, but accidentally knocked the bowl off the table. It landed on his head and shattered, leaving severe cuts in Sonic's back, shoulders, and head. He began screaming and crying from pain. Tails angrily stomped out of his room, until Sonic's crying suddenly stopped, followed by a small thud. Tails stormed back to where he had left Sonic. To his absolute terror, Sonic was lying motionless on the kitchen floor in a pool of blood. There were pieces of the bowl scattered across the floor. Tails quickly ran to the first aid kit and made sure to bandage Sonic's injuries well enough to keep the poor, little hedgehog alive. Tails then ran to his plane, Sonic in his arms, and flew them both to the nearest hospital. In a matter of minutes, Tails was stuck watching as doctors began trying extremely hard to take care of Sonic.
111111112.title: Handling a Four-Year-Old

1111111122.content:
Tails noticed that Sonic's eyes were beginning to open. "Sonic, you alright?" Tails asked worriedly, walking over to the bedside.

"I hurt. I hurt. I hurt!" Sonic whimpered, beginning to cry.

"Shhh. You're gonna be alright. I'm here."

"I sorry, Tails. I bad kid." Sonic whimpered, ears now drooping.

"Don't say that. Not now."

"I sorry."

Tails gently stroked Sonic's head. "Shhh. Just hold still."

"Holding still hurts."

"Come on, Sonic. You're okay. I know it. So don't say that." Tails pressed.
1111111122.title: Sonic's Helpless State

11111111221.content:
Sonic watched as Tails left the room, leaving Sonic all alone in the room. Sonic looked around, his fears of being all alone in a room that he can't leave all taking violent forms. He began to tremble, hallucinations caused by his fear making every shadow, light, and tool take a dangerous and terrifying form. As he continued to tremble, he began going into a panic and trying to get out of the bed. He knocked a tray into the bed, causing the tools on it to go flying all over the bed. Several of the landed on Sonic, most recognizably a needle, a few needles to be quite honest. And a scalpel, and a few other sharp ones as well. More blood began pouring out of the little hedgehog. Sonic began to scream.

Tails's ears picked up the sound and he ran back to the room to find what Sonic had accidentally done. "Oh man. I gotta get a doctor now!" Tails thought as he ran to the front desk. "Ma'am, my little brother flipped the tray over! All the tools fell off it and he's bleeding very badly! Please, you have to help him!!" Tails pleaded. The woman gave him a horrified and bewildered look. She quickly sent the doctors and nurse that had been taking care of Sonic earlier to go check to see if Tails was correct, which he was. Tails ran back to the room.

"How did he get into something like that while you were here?!" the nurse asked in an accusing tone.

"I wasn't in here! He was waking up, I thought he might be hungry so I headed out to the snack machine to get him something and almost 3 minutes after I left the room I heard him screaming and crying like he had when he hurt himself in the first place so I ran back to check on him and I found him like this!!" Tails flustered.

"Tails, I hurt!" Sonic whimpered loudly.

Tails rushed to Sonic's side. "Shhh. It's gonna be alright. They're gonna make you feel better."

"I so scared. And I hurt so much." Sonic whispered, then passed out. Tails immediately checked the monitor. Sonic appeared to have simply fainted. Tails looked down.

"Sir, maybe you should get something for him now. He won't know you're gone." the nurse said softly.
11111111221.title: Tails Doesn't Know

choices: After Sonic is able to return home
111111112212.content:
"I'm worried about what he could wind up doing if I let him out of my sight. So I can't leave him. Not now." Tails sighed. "And besides, I'm still trying to figure out his to be a good, older brother. I…I'm just not getting it right! There's gotta be some sort of trick to this thing. And I just don't know what it is!" Tails said frustratedly, more to himself than anything. He began pacing, then, like an electric pulse, and idea rushed from his feet to his head. "Pacing…gave me ideas… That's what he always did when he was trying to think of a plan." Tails thought, then resumed pacing.

"Hey, you're in luck. He seems to be almost healed. He can go home by sundown." one doctor interrupted Tails.

"That's good." Tails sighed in relief.
111111112212.title: Taking Care of Sonic

1111111122121.content:
Now that Sonic was able to go home, Tails picked Sonic up and set him on the floor. "Come on, Sonic. It's time to go home." Tails said, taking Sonic by the hand. They walked to the front desk, Tails signed Sonic out, and they returned to the plane. As soon as Tails had gotten Sonic into the front seat with him, Sonic attempted to get on the wing. "Sorry, Sonic. But it's too dangerous." Tails sighed, buckling them both in. Sonic began throwing a major tantrum. "What do you want from me?!!!!! I know you don't wanna have to walk the whole way!!!!!" Tails snapped. Sonic began to cry. "Hey, come on. I'm trying to do the best I can. You're not very easy to deal with." Tails huffed. Sonic now began crying harder. "I'm sorry. Please don't cry. I just haven't slept well for a while."

Sonic sniffled, nuzzled into Tails's fur, and began falling asleep. "I…sorry…Tails…" Sonic said softly.
1111111122121.title: The Quiet…ish Evening

choices: Tails finds Sonic before Sonic gets lost
Sonic finds somebody else before Tails gets to him
11111111221211.content:
Sonic, the next morning, woke up early…in the hallway. He was very confused, considering how he had been asleep with Tails originally. His stomach growled, so he walked over to the door of his and Tails's bedroom and knocked. "Tails!!!" Sonic called.

"Get lost. I'm trying to sleep." a grouchy, exhausted voice came in reply.

"I lonely, Tails!!!" Sonic pressed.

"Then go find somebody else to **** off."

Sonic's ears went down. "Okay. I leave now." Sonic said miserably, then trudged over to the front door. It, of course, was locked. "Darn it. Now how I get out and find somebody?" Sonic whined. He then felt pain in his stomach. He looked over at the kitchen and ran over to it. He clambered up onto the countertop. He noticed a window, opened it, and escaped. "Bye, Tails. Sorry I make you so angry. I leave before you hate me." Sonic sighed, then wandered off.

At this point, Tails had noticed that Sonic had given up /WAY/ to quickly. "Sonic?" Tails asked, opening the door. The little hedgehog wasn't in the hallway. Tails thought of what he had said to Sonic, then his eyes widened. "Uh-oh." He rushed into the living room, no hedgehogs there, then he turned to the kitchen. What he saw knocked the breath right out of him. The window was open. He rushed outside. "SONIC, WHERE ARE YOU?!!!!!!!" Tails cried out. There was no response.
11111111221211.title: Foul-Mooded Brother

choices: After a few minutes of awkward silence
111111112212111.content:
Sonic continued trudging, looking and hoping for somebody to help cheer him up. And possibly feed him. He heard strange noises and the part of the forest he had wandered off into had become dark and scary. He huddled up against a tree, the strange, unfamiliar noises practically surrounding him. His imagination played tricks on him and terrified him. He began to cry, curled up and trembling against the tree he had found. He heard crunching and snapping noises that were rapidly closing in on him. He began to sweat, rock back and forth, and hyperventilate. Suddenly, something grabbed him by the waist and lifted him off the ground. He shrieked in panic. "Shhh." a more than welcome voice came in response.

"T-Tails? I-I sorry. I not mean to make you unhappy." Sonic whimpered, clinging to the fox.

"Don't say that. It's just not easy to sleep with you around. …that came out wrong. But, oh well. We can talk some more when we get home." Tails murmured as he headed back.

"You said for me to find somebody also to **** off."

Tails sighed. "I know, and I'm sorry. You're my best friend and I can't believe I said something like that to you. I'm so sorry."

Sonic looked up at Tails with wide, peircing eyes and a trembling lip. "Tails…"

"What?"

"I…I love you. And I hungry. Really hungry." Sonic said meekly.

Tails looked down for a second and immediately looked away. "Please, don't do the puppy-dog eyes on me. That makes me feel bad."

Now Sonic sniffled. "I sorry."

Tails gave a deep sigh. "Sometimes, I get the feeling that you're doing this on purpose." Tails huffed.
111111112212111.title: A Sad, Lonely, Little Hedgehog

choices: Tails and Sonic both manage to fall asleep
Sonic's snoring continues keeping Tails up
1111111122121111.content:
Tails sighed, half asleep with a little hedgehog snuggled up against him. "Jeez'. Even as a kid, he snores like thunder. Good grief." Tails thought. The snoring stopped and he heard an almost adorable yawn. "Oops."

"Tails? You awake?"

"Yeah. Why?"

"Is that why you not sleep?"

"No. You just snore way too loud."

"I sorry. I not mean keep you awake." Sonic whimpered. Tails now regretted having said anything in the first place. "So that why I wake up lonely."

Tails's ears went down. "Sonic, it's alright. It's not your fault." Tails attempted, but it was too little too late. Sonic was already crying. "Sonic…come on. Don't cry."

"I sorry!" Sonic said urgently, sounding almost hurt.

Tails picked Sonic up. "Sonic, look at me. It's not your fault. You didn't do anything wrong. It was my fault. I'm sorry I made you feel bad." Tails tried again, but he didn't get a reply. He hung his head. "Sonic, please, calm down." Sonic sniffled and nuzzled into Tails's middle. Tails sighed and gently stroked Sonic's back. Slowly, the petting began to work its magic. Sonic began calming down. After finally calming Sonic down, Tails lay back down. "Now let's both try to sleep."
1111111122121111.title: Nap Time

11111111221211111.content:
Tails and Sonic both got plenty of sleep. By the next morning, Tails woke up feeling cheerful and refreshed. Sonic woke up a minute later feeling hungry. However, when he looked up, he saw that Tails was already up, which made him very worried. "I-I not mean to!" Sonic yipped, honestly very unsettled by this.

"What? What's wrong? Did you do something?" Tails asked gently.

"I not mean to keep you up!!" Sonic said as he began to cry.

Tails grimaced at this. "Sonic, I just woke up a minute before you. Calm down. You didn't keep me up." Tails sighed.

Sonic looked up with teary eyes. "I-I didn't?"

"No. So calm down. It's o…kay? Sonic…what's wrong?" Tails asked worriedly, having suddenly been hugged by his little brother.

"I so happy I not keep you up this time." Sonic whimpered.

Tails sighed in relief. "That's all. You had me worried. I thought you were upset or something." Tails murmured. He picked Sonic up and hugged him. He then heard Sonic's stomach growl. He laughed softly. "You're hungry, aren't you?" Sonic nodded. "Let's get some real food for breakfast. How's that sound?"

"You mean, we go somewhere to eat?" Sonic asked, sounding very excited. Tails smiled and nodded. "I love you so much, Tails!!!" Sonic announced.

"Heh. I love you too, Sonic. But we're still both going to sit in the same seat in my plane."

Now Sonic pouted. "Now you made it bad." Sonic said almost crossly.

"No, you just wanna complain about it. If you don't wanna go, you can stay here." Tails teased.
11111111221211111.title: What Sleep Can Do

111111112212111112.content:
Tails flew to a restaurant, Sonic on his lap, and landed in a large clearing. "Come on, Sonic." Tails said, taking Sonic by the hand. He led Sonic down the street and into the building, where they soon found a seat and sat down. Tails abruptly noticed something familiar about the person in the booth in front of them. "Uh-oh." Tails thought as the red person turned to look. "Not him. You gotta be kidding me. Of all the people to run into." Tails muttered, sinking down. Then, to his horror, he noticed that Sonic wasn't beside him any more.

Sonic slipped past Tails and walked up to Knuckles, who wasn't looking. "Knux?" Sonic asked, crawling up into Knuckles's lap.

Knuckles jumped, resulting in a pained yelp coming from the hedgehog that was on his lap. "What in the!?"

"Oh come on. You gotta be kidding me." Tails huffed, getting up. He crawled over to where Knuckles was, grabbed Sonic, and withdrew. However, he didn't get anywhere. Knuckles grabbed his tails before he could escape.

Tails turned to look at Knuckles. "Ahem. Care to explain what you were doing on me?"

"I-I wasn't!"

"Then why did you just come out from under the table?"

"I was getting my friend off of you!"

"Oh really?"

"Yeah!"

"Then show him to me."

"Umm…how about not?" Tails asked nervously.

"Listen here you stupid runt, I am in no mood to be messed with." Knuckles growled.

Sonic noticed that Knuckles was about to punch Tails. He began wriggling loose, which he managed to do. However, he noticed that it was too late to stop Knuckles, so he jumped in front of Tails, thus taking the punch in Tails's place. He was sent rolling across the floor. "Oh man. Not good." Tails thought. He looked at Knuckles with disgust in his eyes. "Let go of me."
111111112212111112.title: An Unpleasant Run-In

1111111122121111121.content:
"Listen you stupid brat, you'd better tell me what's going-"

"You just punched the kid you wanted to see. Now let go of me. I need to make sure he's okay." Tails growled.

Knuckles let go and pushed Tails away. Tails knelt beside Sonic. "Tails…I see…sparkles. I…can't move…" Sonic grunted, trying to get up.

"Shhh. Just lay down. You took a pretty hard hit. You shouldn't move too much right now." Tails sighed.

"Ahem! Care to explain what's going on here?"

"Umm…"
1111111122121111121.title: Problematic Moment

choices: Knock the bowl off the table and make a run for it
Throw the bowl at Tails and run
11111111221211111211.content:
Tails stood up, Sonic in his arms. "You attacked my little brother. We just got here. He wanted to look around, I saw him go under your table and went after him, and you punched him. What the heck is wrong with you?" Tails growled. Sonic gave Tails a worried look.

"Well you should keep a better watch on him then." Knuckles growled back.

"You stupid neanderthal." Tails muttered.

"Hey!" Knuckles snapped.

"What?! Am I supposed to think higher of some guy I just met who acts like that!?" Tails retorted.

"Tails, I thought you were better than that." Sonic said quietly.

"Well I'm in no mood to have to deal with this. Come on, we're leaving."

"B-but we didn't even eat anything!" Sonic flustered.

"We can eat at home!" Tails spat. Then, he walked outside and over to the plane. Sonic, as they were flying home, was beyond angry at Tails. Not only had they not gotten breakfast, Tails had lied directly to Knuckles. Sure it wasn't as bad as lying to Sonic, but it still made him very, very unhappy, and made him very unsure of anything Tails said. Tails noticed Sonic's expression. "Oh will you just knock it off already!? I said we'd eat at home, so quit pouting!"

"Hmph!" Sonic responded, folding his arms. Tails growled softly at Sonic's stubbornness.

Tails landed in their front yard, hopped out, and carried Sonic inside. He made Sonic a bowl of cereal and set Sonic down at the table. "There. Now eat up and stop pouting."

"I not hungry." Sonic muttered.

"You were hungry earlier, so I know you're still hungry. So eat."

"No!"

Tails scowled at Sonic. "Just eat. I don't want you to be starving, so just eat."

"Hmph!!" Tails muttered some…inappropriate… words for Sonic's current age. Sonic was furious at this point. He noticed that the front door was open, but he needed a distraction.
11111111221211111211.title: Tails's Lies

111111112212111112112.content: Sonic looked at the bowl, then at Tails. Tails started to look away, so Sonic threw the bowl at Tails, hitting him in the face in doing so, and fled. "SONIC!!!!!!!!" Tails screamed in a fury. He fumbled to the bathroom and grabbed a towel, then wiped his face. He ran back to the kitchen to find that Sonic wasn't there. "SONIC, GET BACK HERE!!!!!!!!!!" Tails shouted as loudly as he could. There was no reply. Tails sighed. "Where could he be? I know things went horribly earlier but…he knows he shouldn't be running around like this without somebody to keep him safe." Tails thought, deeply worried. He rushed to his plane and flew it as he searched for any sign of Sonic. "Where does he think he's going? I hope he's got a plan. Because if he doesn't have one…he's gonna get himself into a lot of trouble.
111111112212111112112.title: Escape

choices: Tails finds them and stops them
1111111122121111121121.content:
Sonic was running as fast as his small body could carry him. He hoped that he could make it back to where they had bumped into Knuckles earlier before Knuckles left. Fortunately, he did. Knuckles was just about to leave. He noticed Sonic. "Didn't you already leave? Where's your stupid brother now?! Hiding somewhere!!?" Knuckles spat.

"No. I ran back. I…I need you help me." Sonic answered uncomfortably.

"Huh?" Knuckles asked.

"Knux, do you recognize me?" Sonic asked, moving a little closer.

"Not really. How do you know me?" Knuckles responded.

"It me, Sonic. Tails been acting really weird for a while. I worried about him. He been really mean to me." Sonic admitted.

Knuckles laughed at this. "So you expect me to think you're Sonic?!!! Boy have you got problems, kid!!!" Knuckles laughed.

"I prove it. Watch me." Sonic said. Knuckles tried to hold back his laughter long enough to see what the kid was going to do. Sonic ran full speed, grabbed something of a tray one of the waiters was carrying, and sat down to eat it. Knuckles gave a rather shocked look. The waiter tapped Sonic's back with his foot. "Hm?" he asked, looking back.

"Give it back right now, kid." the man ordered rather angrily.

"But I really hungry. Please." Sonic begged, giving the waiter his undefeatable puppy-eyes.

The man looked at Sonic, then sighed. "Fine. Just stop staring." he said, sounding very vulnerable.

"Thank you." Sonic said warmly. And with that, he began to nibble on it, trying to re-awaken his appetite. Knuckles walked up to him and scowled. "What?"

"You stole food. How am I supposed to believe that you're Sonic when you do something like that?" Knuckles huffed, folding his arms.

"I didn't get eat last time. I hungry." Sonic said timidly. Knuckles sighed, still giving him the same, disapproving look. Then, he heard Sonic's stomach growl. "C-can I eat it now?"

"Fine. Just hurry up." Knuckles sighed.

Sonic began scarfing it down. Knuckles watched in awe as the whole thing went down in barely a minute. "That feel better…" Sonic said happily. He then looked up at Knuckles. "I catch you up soon. Where you go?" Sonic asked.

"Back to Angel Island." Knuckles said calmly.

"I tell you what happen there. Okay?" Sonic asked.

"Fine. Come on." Knuckles sighed, taking Sonic by the hand. They both walked out.
1111111122121111121121.title: Sonic's Back-up Plan

11111111221211111211211.content:
Knuckles and Sonic made it to Angel Island, Sonic explained everything that had happened, and Knuckles simply gave him a doubtful look. "You're kidding, right?" Knuckles asked.

"Sorry. Not kidding." Sonic sighed. "I…need you help me. I…I don't know what to do."

Tails sat up and shook off the dizziness. Then, a loud variety of noises came from behind him. Tails whipped around, only to find Sonic curled up and crying. "Sonic! S-Sonic, what's wrong?!?! A-are you okay!?!?" Tails yelped as he rushed to his brother's side. Sonic now began trembling. Tails gently placed a hand on Sonic's leg. "Sonic, what's the matter? 11211121.title: A Little Brother's Comfort

1121112121.content:
Knuckles was coming to talk to Tails, well....more like beat the heck out of Tails, for having taken a chaos emerald while Knuckles was 'guarding' them. Tails had originally thought of making himself grow, but Knuckles was able to punch through mountains, so he was definitely going to be able to break a few bones no matter how big Tails was, so Tails asked Sonic to be his test subject. Sonic noticed Knuckles and hid, worried he might hurt Knuckles like he had nearly hugged Tails to death. Knuckles punched down the door of the lab/house, grabbed Tails, and tossed him roughly outside. Tails yelped in pain. Sonic looked at the two, mentally debating whether or not to fight Knuckles off, rescue Tails, or stay hidden. Knuckles turned and stormed back to Tails. "I told you to stop taking things behind my back." Knuckles growled.

"You were sleeping. I didn't want to wake you since last time you knocked me out the second I got you up." Tails whimpered timidly. Knuckles punched Tails, not too hard, but hard enough to make Tails scream. "Knuckles, please, stop." Tails coughed. Sonic noticed that Knuckles was beyond ticked off, and immediately realized that if he stayed in hiding, Tails would definitely wind up in the hospital. He stood and snuck up behind the house, avoiding either male's view.
1121112121.title: It's a Funny Story...

choices: Run in and stop the fight
11211121212.content:
Sonic, as Knuckles was just about to punch Tails again, lunged and gave Knuckles a quick smack, thus getting Knuckles away from Tails. "Hey, you alright?" Sonic whispered to Tails, dropping to one knee. Then he noticed blood pouring out of where Knuckles had punched Tails. "Go inside and take care of that thing. I'll handle him." Tails sniffled and nodded, then went inside. "Thinks he can do that to Tails, huh? Well it's about time he figured out who he shouldn't be messing with." Sonic growled softly. He got back up and walked towards Knuckles. Knuckles looked up and cautiously inched back. "That is NOT okay with me!!!!" Sonic snapped.

"What!?" Knuckles asked in alarm.

"You punching my lil' bro. Not okay. Got it?" Sonic snarled.

Now Knuckles realized who it was. "This is not the day to pick a fight with me!" he spat.

"Then ya' shouldn't've picked one with me."

"You never stopping picking fights with people, do you!?"

"You hurt Tails, you've messed with the wrong little brother. You wanna back out and go now, fine with me. But it's a better idea than sticking around." And with that, Sonic folded his arms and scowled down at the red echidna. Knuckles just growled and headed toward where Tails was. Sonic grabbed Knuckles and lifted him off the ground. "I warned you, you took your chances, now I think it's time to make sure you go." Sonic growled, then dropped Knuckles. As Knuckles was gliding, Sonic performed his 'Blue Tornado' and then, as Knuckles was now caught in the vortex, Sonic kicked the echidna, earning Knuckles an immediate need for hospitalization. But Sonic wasn't finished. Not as long as Knuckles was still conscious. Or, at least as long as Sonic /thought/ he was conscious. Knuckles was fading in and out, trying desperately to remain awake. Tails had come outside, having seen Sonic kick the tornado. He saw Sonic about to step on Knuckles's head, and he knew Sonic wasn't even truly aware of the fact that Knuckles couldn't even move. But he wasn't sure of what he should do.
11211121212.title: Don't Mess With a Giant Hedgehog's Little Brother

choices: While getting Knuckles in the hospital
112111212121.content:
Tails couldn't come up with a better idea in the small amount of time he had. "SONIC, STOP!!!!!!!!!!" Tails screamed, running towards the two. Sonic put his foot back down. "He's out already. We gotta get him to a hospital now!"

"Not worth it." Sonic muttered.

"Please. I borrowed an emerald from him but he was asleep when I took it so I left a note. And he was really mad that I didn't wake him up first. It wasn't all his fault. And I won't let him get killed over that!"

"Who said I was gonna kill him!?"

"If we don't get him to a hospital now, he will be dead! He needs help!"

Sonic stared at Knuckles, looking like he would puke at any given moment. "Oh ***. What did I do!?" Sonic whimpered, beginning to go into a full state of panic.

Tails looked up at Sonic worriedly, then back at Knuckles. "Sonic, just hold it in 'til we get him there, okay? We can't freak out now. Or we'll be too late."

Sonic snatched Tails and Knuckles up, pressed them against his chest, and ran off at full speed, leaving a trail of destruction behind him.

After the trip to the hospital

Tails pressed, but Sonic didn't calm down. It was hard to believe that this was the same Sonic as earlier. Tails sighed, flew up, and gently scratched Sonic behind the ear. 11211222221.content:
As Sonic began to grow, the energy seemed to increase due to all the energy he still had in his body from the rings he had with him…and his chaos emerald. It was insane. It only took two or three seconds to bang his head on the ceiling. Tails was awestruck. Sonic noticed that Tails was trapped, and he didn't have a nanosecond to waste. He quickly hunkered down over Tails to protect his younger sibling. He knew he didn't have time to even /try/ to evacuate Tails. Tails whimpered in fear, unsure of WHAT was happening at this point. He could hear Sonic grunting and whimpering. He didn't know what to do about it either. Sonic outgrew the lab. He peeked in at Tails, then noticed that Tails was just as frightened as he was.

Finally, the growth stopped. Sonic sat up, Tails in his cupped hands, and peeked in at Tails. "YOU OKAY?!!!!!!!" Sonic's voice boomed. Tails yelped and shielded his ears. "S-Sorry!!!" Sonic said nervously.

Tails could recognize the voice, but this was too unreal. Especially considering all he could actually see of Sonic was an enormous eyeball. "S-S-Sonic?" Tails whimpered.

"Hey, it's alright!!!! It's just me!!!! Don't worry!!!!" Sonic attempted, but then he realized that Tails probably couldn't recognize him right now. He gently put Tails on the ground. "You okay?!!!! I didn't hurt ya', did I?!!!!"
11211222221.title: Quick thinking

112112222211.content:
Tails stared at Sonic, unable to utter even the faintest sound. "TAILS, COME ON, ANSWER ME, LIL' BRO!!!!!!!!!!" Sonic pleaded. Tails just continued to stare. Sonic moved closer to Tails. Tails fell backwards and his mouth opened, but he was still unable to make a sound. "TAILS, PLEASE, SAY SOMETHING!!!!!!!!!! YOU'RE SCARING ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!" Sonic said urgently. Tails gulped and tried to utter something, but all that came out was a high-pitched whimper. "T-TAILS, I-I DIDN'T HURT YOU, DID I?!!!!!!!!!" Sonic asked in alarm.

"S…sca…scary……" Tails said meekly.

Sonic's ears drooped and he pulled back. "I…I DIDN'T MEAN TO SCARE YOU!!!!!!!!!! I'M SORRY, TAILS!!!!!!!!!!" Sonic said, sounding heart-broken.

Tails immediately realized that Sonic was a nervous wreck too. "S…So…Sonic?" Sonic turned away, hugged his knees, and lowered his head. Tails steeled his courage and gently placed a hand on Sonic's back. "Y-you okay?"

"I…I'M FINE!!!!!!!!!! DON'T WORRY!!!!!!!!" Sonic whimpered.

Tails looked down. "I'm sorry for panicking on you, I just…I wasn't ready. Please, don't get so upset." Tails said comfortingly.
112112222211.title: Awed Silence

1121122222112.content:
Sonic laid down on his side and curled up. Tails swallowed hard, realizing that it was his fault that Sonic was upset for more than one reason. "Sonic…you okay?" Tails asked.

Sonic curled up tighter. "I'M FINE!!!!!!!!!"

Tails shook his head. "Sonic, don't be so upset. I didn't mean for this to happen. I-"

"I'M NOT UPSET!!!!!" Sonic said weakly.

"Stop telling me only what you think I want to hear! You don't have to worry about keeping up appearances around /me/!! I'm your brother! I don't need to see you pretend everything's fine when I can see plain as day that you're upset!" Tails snapped.

"PROMISE YOU WON'T TELL ANYONE?!!!!!!!!" Sonic sniffled.

"I promise. You should know better than to think I would anyway." Tails sighed, coming closer. Suddenly, Sonic grabbed him and began crying. Tails's eyes widened briefly, then became soft and full of concern. "Sonic…what's wrong?"

"I'M SO BIG!!!!!!!!!! AND I SCARED YOU!!!!!!!!!! I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" Sonic sobbed, tightening his grip slightly.

Tails reached up and stroked Sonic's cheek. "I'm sorry, Sonic. I didn't mean to make you so upset. I just wasn't ready. Please don't be so worked up. I'm here for you. Don't worry. I promise I won't let you down. If you need anything, just tell me and I'll be right there. I'll do my best to help you out. Don't worry." Tails murmured.
1121122222112.title: Hard to Find the Light

11211222221121.content:
Sonic began to calm down slowly, but quickly enough that Tails was able to notice it. Tails smiled up at Sonic, who, at this point, had stopped crying. Sonic smiled back at Tails. Tails felt greatly relieved to see Sonic smiling. After all, Sonic's crying had worried him a lot. To see Sonic smiling again put most of his fears at ease. "Sonic, I promise I'll make this whole thing up to you. Just let me know if you need anything." Tails said firmly.

"YOU DON'T NEED TO!!!!!!!!" Sonic said, sitting up and raising Tails to eye level.

"But this is my fault. I owe it to you to do my best to help you." Tails pressed.

Sonic smiled and pulled Tails into another hug. "ALRIGHT BUT I PROMISE TO DO THE SAME!!!!!!!" Sonic said warmly. Then he looked at the remain of the house and began shifting through the rubble until he found a bed. He did his best to dust it off. "HERE!!!!!!!!! IT'S GETTING LATE SO YOU GO ON TO BED!!!!!!!!!! I'M GONNA FIND SOMEWHERE TO LIE DOWN!!!!!!!!!!!!" Sonic said as he set Tails down.

Tails wiped the bed off as best he could. Suddenly, he fell on the bed as the ground quaked. He looked and noticed that Sonic was lying down. He sighed and got in bed, then quickly fell asleep.
11211222221121.title: Sunshine in a Smile

112112222211212.content:
Sonic woke up late at night. He sat up, listening to the growls coming from his stomach. He glanced over at Tails, only to find that the little fox was still sleeping soundly. Sonic carefully got up, then began walking in search of something to eat. He walked for almost an hour until finally coming to a stop. "MAN, IS THERE /ANYWHERE/ I CAN GET SOME DARN FOOD?!!!!!!!!!" he whined. Then his eyes focused on a tree. "NO, I AM NOT ABOUT TO EAT SOMETHING LIKE THAT!!!!!!!!!!!!" he told himself. Then he sighed. "BUT I'M SO HUNGRY RIGHT NOW EVEN A TREE SOUNDS GOOD!!!!!!!! MAYBE IF I JUST SWALLOW IT WHOLE IT WON'T BE SO BAD!!!!!!!!!!!" he mumbled, picking the tree up. He tossed his head back and opened his mouth wide. He dropped the tree in and swallowed it whole. His eyes widened. "That actually filled me up some. Thank goodness." he thought. "But I'm still kinda hungry." He grabbed another tree and ate it. After a few more trees, he found himself feeling stuffed. "UGH…I'M SO FULL!!!!!!! MAYBE I WON'T HAVE TO WORRY TAILS ABOUT ME BEING HUNGRY NOW!!!!!!!!" Sonic chuckled, rubbing his full stomach. He walked back to where Tails was still sleeping and carefully laid back down. Tails jolted awake and looked at Sonic. "WHAT?!!!!!!!!"

Tails smiled slightly. "Sorry, I'm just not used to the ground shaking every time you lie down."

"IT DOES?!!!!!!" Sonic asked. Tails nodded. "JEEZ', I'M REALLY SORRY 'BOUT THAT, TAILS!!!!!!!!" Sonic said, looking very upset.

"Don't worry about it. It's not your fault. Don't worry." Tails murmured. Sonic looked away. Tails sighed, got out of bed, and flew over to Sonic. "Sonic, please. Don't get so upset." Tails pleaded. Sonic grabbed Tails and hugged him. Tails fell asleep a few minutes later, followed by Sonic.
112112222211212.title: Midnight Hunger

choices: Tails realizes that he needs to work on finding a way to make meals for Sonic
1121122222112121.content:
Sonic woke up just in time to see the sun rise. He immediately woke Tails up. "TAILS, YOU GOTTA SEE THIS!!!!!!!!" Sonic announced, grabbing Tails.

"AH!!!!" Tails cried in alarm. He looked up to see the sun rising over the horizon. He and Sonic both felt hope being renewed inside of them. He and Sonic smiled and watched the sun coming up. Once it was up to a certain point, they couldn't look at it directly anymore and turned away. "That was amazing!" Tails said.

Sonic smiled down at Tails. "I JUST KNEW I COULDN'T WATCH IT WITHOUT YOU, LIL' BRO!!!!!!! IT WAS TOO BEAUTIFUL TO LEAVE YOU OUT!!!!!!!!" Sonic said warmly. Tails smiled back at Sonic. "SO HOW'D YA SLEEP LAST NIGHT?!!!!!!!!"

Tails rubbed the back of his head. "Well, you being giant and sleeping well aren't compatible. You're snoring kept me up for a while." Tails mumbled. Sonic looked heartbroken. Tails immediately began to panic. "Please, don't worry, Sonic! I just need some time to get used to it is all! Don't worry!"

"DO YOU THINK IT WOULDA HELPED IF I LET YOU FALL ASLEEP FIRST?!!!!!!!"

1121122222112121.title: Here Comes the Sun

1211.content:
Tails was working with a strange material he had recently found. It was almost like a scale or quill from an animal that had most likely gone extinct. After all, it was very beautiful and most beautiful objects that came from animals were taken through either skinning it or taking it out forcefully. He had contemplated these thoughts for a while before finally deciding to use it…or at least figure out what it was and what it did, if it did anything at all.

"How does something like this even still exist? It couldn't have been kept safe for this long. But what if there's more of these somewhere? Maybe on a different continent or something. Oh well. I'm not gonna find anything out like this. I'll just analyze it and see what I can find out." Tails sighed, taking the scale over to a nearby machine. After a few minutes, the machine gave him the analysis. "It would be impossible to use for decoration. But it's an excellent component for a lazer. But it seems to be unable to hurt anything. Hmm…" Tails then built the lazer gun and added the scale to make the actual lazer beam. "Alright. Time to test it out!" he thought. Then a knock came at the door. "Guess testing can wait long enough to see who's there."
1211.title: Problems…

12111.content:
Sonic smiled at Tails. "Hey, lil' bro. How's it goin'?" Sonic asked cheerfully.

"I just built a laser gun. I was about to test it out." Tails replied.

"Well, let's see what it does then." Sonic chuckled, leading Tails back inside. Tails grabbed a small mouse to experiment on and used the beam on it. It practically evaporated, as far as they could tell. Sonic looked at where it had been to find that it was now /very/ small. "Wow!" Sonic gawked, picking the small rodent up. "Look at it, Tails!"

Tails came closer to see the shrunken mouse. "So that's why the material is considered harmless. It can't hurt anything on its own." Tails mumbled, looking deep in thought.

Sonic tightened his grip a little bit, fearful that he might drop the tiny mouse, only to wind up crushing it. "Oops."

"Huh?"

"I-I didn't mean to kill it. I-I just didn't wanna drop it."

"You killed the mouse?" Sonic nodded. "Well, it was too small to have survived either way, so I don't think it actually matters."

Sonic sighed, walked by the laser gun that Tails had set down, and then stopped. The temptation was incredible. He couldn't even try to look away. Tails heard the gun move and looked to see that Sonic was holding it. Sonic noticed that Tails was trying to tell him to put it down, but Sonic couldn't even hear what Tails was saying.
12111.title: Why Not to Let Sonic Touch Experiments

121111.content:
By the time he had snapped out of it, Tails was shrunken to about 3 or 4 inches tall. Sonic felt awful about what he had just done to Tails. He hung his head and stomped his foot, furious with himself.

Tails, on the other hand, had no idea what had just happened. He sat on the floor, his vision still making everything spin, until suddenly the ground quaked beneath him and his ears heard a loud boom, bringing him to his senses. But he didn't know what it was or where he was, he just had the feeling that he needed to get some distance from whatever it was that had shaken the ground. He fled until he found himself in a corner. He felt trapped. Then, the ground shook, very very slightly at first, but slowly increased in magnitude. Tails peeked out to see if he could figure out what it was, then saw red out of the corner of his eye. "Something's coming. Something evil. But I can't move. My body won't let let me get up." Tails thought in panic. Suddenly, something huge came down nearby. A voice came from the 'monster' that was closing in. Tails screamed.

Sonic felt awful inside. The guilt was ripping his insides apart. And, worse than anything, Tails was scared of him. "T-Tails?" Sonic asked, moving a little closer. Tails now screamed. "Tails!" Sonic yipped, dropping to both knees to make sure Tails was alright. Tails fainted. Sonic's eyes widened. "Tails?" he whimpered, gingerly lifting Tails off the floor. He then cradled the fox in his arms and headed to their house. (considering they are brothers even though adopted I believe they share a house.) Sonic sat on the couch, staring down at Tails, worried that he might have hurt Tails.
121111.title: Sonic's Concern

1211111.content:
Sonic sat on the couch for a long time. He could feel exhaustion trying to pull him away, but his fear was so intense he couldn't rest. He had to know if Tails was alright. Finally, he felt movement. Remembering Tails's earlier reaction, Sonic held Tails against his middle and lay down on his back, still watching his shrunken sibling with worried eyes. "Please, be okay, Tails. I'm sorry I did this to you. Just please don't be mad. And please be okay." Sonic thought, his stomach aching as the guilt churned it wildly.

Tails slowly awoke. His eyes opened but he couldn't figure out what was going on. He could feel the ground shift beneath him and it felt warm…and sort of soft. He couldn't figure out what it was. There was something holding him in place. "Where am I? Am I still on Mobius? Is this even real?" Tails wondered. Then, a slight bit of light shone in, allowing him to see out and most of what was surrounding him. The thing he was stuck lying down on was peach-colored and seemed to expand and contract. The thing holding him down was white. Everything else seemed to be blue. "What is that? Is that a hand? I think so. It's wearing some sort of material. But…" Then it all sank in.
1211111.title: Bad Wake Up Call

Suddenly, he was lifted up off the ground he wished he had stayed on. Next thing he knew, there was the enormous face of the monster that had done this to him. "I'm so dead." Tails thought in panic.

12111112.title: Not Good

Tails landed safely on Sonic's arm. Sonic didn't seem to notice either. Tails checked Sonic's face to measure his amount of time. It was red, already beginning to change to purple. Tails rushed over to Sonic's ears. "Sonic, please, breathe. Y-you're scaring me. I-I don't what to do! I-I just didn't expect to wake up like that! P-please, breathe!! Sonic!!!" Tails begged, his tension and panic echoing in his tone. Sonic gasped for air, but coughed it all out. "SONIC!!!!!!!!" I didn't know what to do!! I didn't mean for this to happen! Sonic…I…" And with that, Tails passed out. The stress had been too much for him to bear. And the guilt was overwhelming.

Sonic's breathing was settling down as he listened to Tails's attempt to calm him down. He had some trouble though, and when Tails passed out, it quickly made him realize that he had no choice but to suck it up and try to make it up to Tails. "Sleep tight, lil' bro." he murmured, running a finger down Tails's head and back gently. And with that, sleep overtook him and he fell asleep on the couch.
121111121.title: Peace of Mind

Tails reached out and gently stroked Sonic's cheek. "If I'm not allowed to be sorry, neither are you. So calm down. It's okay." Tails murmured. "Maybe you oughta get some sleep. You need it."
1211111211.title: A Bit of Hope

"I know, but what if this thing's busted?" Sonic sighed.

"That could be true, too." Tails admitted.

A few seconds later, Sonic returned to see that the girl was covered from head to toe in soap. He helped her get it off. Then, he found that, underneath the filth, her quills matched the colors of the scale. He helped her get out and wrapped a towel around her. "Feel better?" he asked.

"Yeah. A lot." she answered.

Sonic led her into the living room. "Hey, Tails, figured out where it was." Sonic said.

"Really? Where?" Tails asked.

"We brought her home with us." Sonic replied.

"You mean…" Tails gasped.

He had already finished the actual fight, now he was just chasing Eggman. Eggman reached a window. "You haven't seen the last of me, hedgehog!" Eggman stated.

Sonic sneered at this. "I know that, Egghead." Sonic snickered, his eyes giving off an almost evil glare. He put the whole base on lockdown, thus preventing Eggman's escape. "I know you won't escape. 'Cuz I'm not done with you yet." Eggman looked frightened, scared, maybe even terrified. "Ya' see, Tails made this." Sonic began, pulling out a laser gun. "Wanted me to find something…organic…to test it on. I thought of testing it on your robots, but that just didn't feel right. Sure it worked…but we both know your little machines aren't really alive."

"Wh-wh-why d-d-don't y-you t-t-test it on s-s-somebody else?" Eggman stuttered, feeling very frightened.

"There's nobody else I'd rather use it on than you. You should feel flattered. I don't say stuff like that to a lot of people, Eggy. So, if you don't want me to use it on your corpse, I suggest you hold still and let me use it on you. Otherwise, I might just have to make sure you never move again. Once I'm done, I'll show you to Tails, and he can fix you. But if you tell him that I gave you the choice between being the test subject and death, I'll still kill you. Do you understand?" Sonic asked as he stepped closer, like a beast closes in for the kill. Eggman could only nod. "Just know that, if you dodge this, I'll kill you." Sonic fired the laser.
1553111.title: Sonic's Cruelty

15531112.content:
The beam struck Eggman directly. Immediately after the beam was gone, Sonic dashed over to the hovercraft that had just landed. He tucked the weapon into his ‘pocket’ and leaned in the machine. Inside, he found Eggman trembling at only a few inches tall. He grinned slightly, trying to make Eggman feel a little better, but it didn't work. "Jeez'. He looks like he's gonna have a heart attack. I hope he won't…I hope he's not too scared." Sonic thought in concern. He reached down and gently picked the shrunken human up. Eggman looked like he would die at any given moment. "Poor guy. I gotta do something. I just hope I didn't give him too big a scare earlier." Sonic thought as he set Eggman down on a nearby desk. He sat down in the chair. "Hey, Eggman, it's gonna be okay. Deep breaths. In and out, in and out. I'm not really gonna hurt ya'. I just wanted to make sure you wouldn't try to run. It's alright." Sonic murmured, gently tapping the man's back. Eggman calmed down tremendously, putting Sonic at ease. "Now come on. We gotta get ya' to Tails."

Eggman looked up, and, to his horror, he was met by an enormous pair of eyes. "S-S-Sonic, is th-that you!?" he asked in alarm, stumbling backwards.

"Hey, come on." Sonic attempted, reaching down to grab the doctor. "Eggman!" Sonic yipped as the human toppled over. He immediately grabbed Eggman and used his sensitive ears to check if the man was still breathing and check his heart rate. He was breathing and his heartbeat was still steady. Sonic gave a sigh of relief, undid the lockdown, and ran out of the base.
15531112.title: Regrets and Pity

155311121.content:
Sonic was sitting on the couch at home with Eggman still out cold. "I hope he'll wake up soon. I didn't mean to scare him so bad." Sonic's thoughts repeated themselves. His ears picked up moaning. He peeked at the human to find that Eggman was finally waking up. "Phew. He's alive. But now what do I do?"

Eggman moaned, coming around. The first thing he noticed was that he was trapped against something warm and…actually rather comfortable. The thing above him was warm and smooth while the thing under him was constantly moving but was very soft, almost like a blanket or a good pillow. "What is this?" he wondered aloud.

"Feelin' any better, Eggy?" Sonic's voice came from outside. "I-I'm really sorry 'bout how I acted earlier. I needed somebody to test it on, and you have no idea how many times I missed the rabbits and whatever else I could find. So I hope you're not mad about it. And please don't be scared. I seriously wasn't gonna hurt you. I just needed to get you to hold still. And I know I look really big, but you're really small."

"Wh-WHAT!?!?!?!?" Eggman cried in dismay.

"Easy, easy. It's okay. Ya' just gotta hang in there, alright? We gotta wait for Tails to get home. I'd go look for him but…I don't want to risk you getting hurt or anything. I won't hurt you on purpose, and I will do my best to keep you safe, but ya' just gotta hang in there, alright? Do ya' wanna take a look at everything? Ya' know, try to figure out what everything looks like to ya' now?"
155311121.title: One Heck of a Bad Day

1553111211.content:
A long silence followed until Sonic finally heard Eggman agree. "Alright, Eggy. Just remember, ya' gotta stay calm. Ya' fainted on me earlier. So just try to keep calm." Sonic replied gently. Eggman felt a part of the object that had been holding him still wrap around his waist. An almost blinding light surrounded him as Sonic moved him onto the coffee table. As he was released, he struggled to find his feet. Once able to stand up, he looked around, his back to Sonic at the moment. Everything was huge. Sonic cautiously slipped off the couch and got on both knees in front of Eggman, who still had his back to the blue hedgehog. Sonic rested his arms on the table and rested his chin on them, waiting to see what Eggman's response would be.

Eggman could hardly believe what he saw. Everything was practically the size of a house to him. Then, as he continued turning, he saw something that put everything else to shame. He had just seen Sonic. "S-Sonic!" he yelped, falling backwards.

"Take it easy, Eggy. I won't hurt ya'. It's alright." Sonic hushed the human. He stroked Eggman's back with the knob of his knuckle. "I got ya'."
1553111211.title: The Shock of it All

choices: Sonic wants to have somebody to fight with
15531112112.content:
Finally, Tails entered the house, only to find Sonic in a fluster trying to calm whatever it was that was on the table down. "Uhhh…Sonic, what are you doing?" Tails asked.

Sonic paused and looked over at Tails, then used his index finger and thumb to grip Eggman's jacket and lift him off the table. "Tails, can ya' fix him?"

Tails approached Sonic and looked at the tiny figure Sonic was holding. "What happened to him?" Tails asked.

"I tested your gun on him and he got really small. And he won't stop getting mad at me!"

"Sonic, I don't think he even deserves to be back to his normal size. I mean, think about it, he's attacked us a lot of times. He keeps destroying things and attacking innocent people. Do you really think he deserves to be back to his normal size?"

Sonic whispered something in Tails's ear. Tails nodded and rushed into the lab to make something for returning Eggman to normal.
15531112112.title: Well Then!

155311121121.content:
Sonic waited for Tails to finish making the cure. Tails returned after an hour or two with something. "If you eat it, it should fix him." Tails whispered into Sonic's ear.

"Thanks, buddy. This should be easy." Sonic chuckled, sounding almost sinister. He winked at Tails, went into his room, and placed Eggman on his middle. "So, Eggy, take your last look around. 'Cuz this is the end of the line for you."

"Wh-wh-what d-do you m-mean?" Eggman asked, trembling.

"Have ya' taken your last look yet?" Eggman nodded slowly and uncertainly. "Good." Sonic licked his lips and dangled the little human over his wide open mouth. Eggman shivered with fright. Suddenly, he found himself plummeting into the hedgehog's mouth. He landed on Sonic's tongue, which rubbed against him a few times. Then, a tidal wave forced the doctor down into the depths of Sonic's stomach. Before he landed, Sonic ate the cure, thus Eggman was once again his normal size. Sonic let out a loud belch and rubbed his huge belly. "Ahhh… That's better." Sonic sighed contently. Tails entered the room to check on Sonic. "Hey, Tails. Maybe next time we should let you get the good part." Sonic yawned. Tails sat down on his bed. This feels /SO/ good."

"I'm glad you're enjoying yourself, Sonic." Tails sighed. Sonic let out another loud belch as Eggman now began trying to get out. "Wow. He's really in trouble now, isn't he?" Tails giggled. Sonic laughed and gave his belly a hard pat.
155311121121.title: Sonic's Final Test

1553111211212.content:
Sonic stomach was still very lively, but then again Eggman wasn't going to be digested very easily considering what he was wearing. Sonic sat on the couch. He burped, patting his belly. "Quit moving in there. You're just gonna make it worse." Sonic huffed. Finally, Tails came downstairs. "Oh, good morning, lil' bro." Sonic said warmly.

"Morning, Sonic." Tails yawned. He sat down beside Sonic and leaned up against him.

"So, who ya' wanna go for?" Sonic asked.

"I'm trying to decide between Amy, Cream, and Vector." Tails shrugged. "I know how I wanna go for 'em, but I'm not sure who I want."
1553111211212.title: Relaxation and Planning

15531112112121.content:
"I'd go with Amy." Sonic said calmly.

"Okay." Tails said as he pulled out the house phone. He called Amy and said something about Sonic. In about 30 minutes, she rang the doorbell. Tails opened the door, and fired the shrink ray. She shrank instantly, so he merely bent down and snatched her up. "Hi, Amy." Tails said calmly.

"T-Tails!?"

"Yeah, it's me, Amy…"
15531112112121.title: Easy Prey

155311121121212.content:
Tails took Amy into his and Sonic's room. "Okay, Amy. I wanna ask you something. Will you play a game with me?" Tails asked.

"Sure, I guess."

"Scream as loud as you can."

"Why do you wanna play that?"

Tails suddenly dangled Amy over his open mouth. She now screamed. He dropped her in, swallowed her, and ate the cure. He rubbed his huge stomach and belched. Sonic walked in. "You likin' it?" he asked.

"Yeah. It does feel good." Tails said contently.

"Well, I already picked my next victim out."

"Really? Who?"
155311121121212.title: Peace

15531112112121221.content:
"I wanna go for Shadow." Sonic replied.

"Are you sure your stomach can handle that?!" Tails asked worriedly.

"Oh yeah. I'm positive."

"Alright…just be careful."

"You know I am." Sonic then took off.

"I know you aren't." Tails sighed, absentmindedly giving his belly gentle pats. It began wiggling as Amy urgently tried getting loose. "Amy, quit it! You know you won't get out! So just be patient!" Tails scolded his gradually digesting ‘meal’. It only got worse. He gave his tummy a hard pound. "Quit it!!"
15531112112121221.title: Next meal

155311121121212211.content:
Sonic crept into Shadow's room in Shadow's house. Shadow was settling into sleep. "Heh heh heh. This is gonna be so easy!" Sonic thought.

"And just what do you think you are doing here, faker?" Shadow interupted Sonic's thought.

"Umm…can I come in? I need to talk to you about something." Sonic answered meekly. Shadow rolled his eyes but let Sonic in anyway. They sat on Shadow's couch.

Shadow looked at Sonic for several minutes. "What did you want? Are you just here to sit on my sofa or-" Sonic shrank him. "What in the-"

"Yeah. So, here's how it is. Either admit you're the faker, or I get to eat you."

"Like you would." Shadow growled.

"Already did it to Egghead. And I'm guessing he either gave up trying to escape or already died." Shadow glared up at Sonic, until Sonic turned to face him completely. Now he could see the huge bulge. He took a few steps back. "So, ya' gonna say it or are ya' gonna be my dinner?" Sonic asked, gently stroking his belly. Shadow decided he'd take pride over death, so he turned his back to the blue hedgehog. Sonic grinned and grabbed Shadow by the waist. "So, I guess this is goodbye, huh? Can't really say it was nice to know you, since you've been against me non-stop. Oh well, it's still nice to have you for dinner." Sonic said before throwing the black hedgehog into his mouth. He swallowed, then ate the cure. His stomach got much bigger. He belched, then smoke came out. "Hey, easy in there! Ya' don't wanna give me indigestion! 'Cuz the more you move, the longer it takes to digest you!" Sonic scolded his new ‘meal’. "Now to go meet up with Tails. I hope I can take Vector."
155311121121212211.title: Sonic's Version of a Gut Buster
